node.title: Harbingers of Hope
node.description: The book of Revelation outlines events that will take place prior to the return of Jesus so that we might know ho near we are. In chapter 13 the writer highlights two nations that will spearhead the enforcement of the universal mark. Who is this second beast, what is its image, and how can we be ready for what is bound to take the world as na overwhelming surprise? Although serious, these are harbingers of hope!
